name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Web Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **React.js**, **TypeScript**, and **MobX** to develop high-performance, responsive web applications. My background in frontend architecture and performance optimization positions me to enhance user experiences while ensuring efficient application functionality. I thrive in collaborative environments, bringing strong communication skills and autonomy to the team, driven by a pragmatic approach to problem-solving. 
Additionally, my technical expertise includes **Python**, **Flutter**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and deep familiarity with cloud services such as **Azure** and **AWS**. I have a proven track record in developing enterprise-grade platforms that leverage AI-based tooling for intelligent automation and real-time data processing, as well as integrating compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My hands-on experience extends to building robust microservices architectures, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation workflows.
